articles.description: The Big Bang Theory is well and truly moving on from his former alter-ego.
articles.content:
The Big Bang Theorys Jim Parsons is unrecognisable in sleek new photoshoot (Picture: Getty Images)
Its fair to say Jim Parsons is putting his days as Sheldon Cooper behind him, if his latest photosh… [+3869 chars]

articles.author: Alice Scarsi
articles.title: Meghan Markle felt British people didn't understand her while she was in England – expert - Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE 'felt the British people didn't understand her' during her stay in the UK as Duchess of Sussex, a royal expert believes - drawing a parallel with American divorcee Wallis Simpson.
